title: Đột Nhiên Nhớ Đến Em (突然想起你)
lyrics: ...Du shi yin wei na deng pao ...tu ran shan liao yi xia Yu shi xiang qi ni pa ni ...huan mei xiu xi ...Du shi yin wei zhe chang yu ...hu ran jian xia de na me da Pa lai bu ji gen ni ...zou zai yi qi Yi ge ren de ye wo de xin ying gai fang zai na li Yong bao guo hou wo de shuang shou ying gai fang zai na li Wo shi zhong xue bu hui kong zhi wo de hu xi Zai bo li chuang shang he chu ni mei li de ming zi Ji mo lai xi jiu yu yi dao di ying gai fang zai na li Xiang nian zhuo ni wo de nian tou ying gai xiang dao na li You shi me fang fa rang liang ge ren bu fen li
